description.value:
The Congenital Abnormality value set includes values that cover common anomalies, including malformations, that are present at birth.
NOTE: The current filter is probably too broard.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
